verbose_text: In addition, AMPKalpha, which is closely associated with cell survival during myocardial ischaemia, stimulates Nrf2 and its downstream antioxidant enzyme HO-1 to resist oxidative stress.
evidence: AMPKalpha, which is closely associated with cell survival during myocardial ischaemia              , stimulates Nrf2 and its downstream antioxidant enzyme HO-1
